video.title: Woowahan Nyeo
video.synopsis: Gong Jung Han and Jo Ah Ra are one of Korea's most beloved celebrity couples. But behind closed doors, their "perfect" relationship is anything but!

episodes.synopsis: Jo Ah Ra and Gong Jung Han are Korea's most high-profile couple, and everyone believes -- mistakenly -- that their marriage is perfect.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The secret is out! Gong Jung Han announces that he is gay and brings his lover home.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Jo Ah Ra's half brother, a pesky news reporter, moves in! He's determined to get the scoop on the couple's suspicious marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Gong Jung Han officially quits his job as an announcer and enters politics. Jo Ah Ra has a steamy one-night stand with the neighbor.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: As Gong Jung Han lies in a coma, Jo Ah Ra is hit with a cheating scandal. Meanwhile, Min Gyu discovers that his crush has cancer.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: As the elections draw near, the race gets intense! Meanwhile, Gong Jung Han catches Jo Ah Ra cheating and becomes jealous, even though he's gay.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Min Gyu meets his birth father. Meanwhile, Jo Ah Ra's affair with her neighbor goes public, and authorities are on the hunt for Ji Sung Ki.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Jung Dang-Hee warns Jo Ah Ra to leave the country, but she refuses.  Meanwhile, Min Gyu is kidnapped by a shadowy figure.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: After seeing the flyers inquiring about Ji Sung Ki's whereabouts, Gong Jung Han grows apprehensive as reality begins to close in on him.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: When Jo Ara and Kong Jung Han receive an incriminating photo, they fear that they may be exposed. Meanwhile, Kong Min Kyu proposes to Yoo Nan Hee.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Gong Jung Han asks for forgiveness, but Ji Sung Ki decides to leave the house. Consequently, the scandal is exposed publicly just before the election.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Sung-ki is found dead and all the mystery behind his death becomes revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 12
